Amir Atefi

Best Man

Amir, the best man, and Scott, the groom, have been close since childhood. Growing up in the same neighborhood, Amir and Scott were inseparable and did everything together. They spent countless hours playing sports, exploring the outdoors, and dreaming about their futures. As they grew older, their friendship only deepened as they supported each other through the ups and downs of life.

Jocelyn Metsch
